snippet: Traveling from India to China to Miami is all in a week’s work for Stephen Marshall, Dewar’s global brand ambassador.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Dewar's global brand ambassador Stephen Marshall discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Traveling from India to China to Miami is all in a week’s work for Stephen Marshall, Dewar’s global brand ambassador.
